channel.title: Weird error
channel.description:
If I compile my client (there's nothing wrong with the compiler it works on other clients),
then this shows up:
javac: file not found: *.java Useage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Finished! Hit any button to continue...

item.title: Weird error
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“I D D S I, post:3, topic:279534”]use this as your compiler: @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

change the jdk1.0.0_05 to your java.[/quote]

like this is set right : “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe” *.java
go to www.java.com , download latest JDK!
and put in : “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe” *.java

Read full topic

use this as your compiler: @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
